Parkinson's Law

Parkinson’s Law: Work expands so as to fill the time available for its completion. Give yourself a task and a time, the task will expand in complexity to fill the time.

How to use Parkinson’s Law to your advantage?

By assigning the right amount of time to a task, we gain back more time and the task will reduce in complexity to its natural state. - Lifehack

  • A Beginners Guide To Parkinson’s Law: How To Do More Stuff By Giving Yourself Less Time
